articles.author: Aditya Kalra
articles.title: India sends 100 antitrust queries for Reliance, Disney $8.5 billion merger, sources say - Reuters
articles.description: India's antitrust body has asked Reliance Industries and Walt Disney around 100 questions linked to their $8.5 billion India media assets merger, including details on sports rights as it heightens its scrutiny of the deal, two sources told Reuters.
